column2: "Something on your mind?"
"See something up there?"
"...Ah. It's you."

"I just wanted to gaze at the sky while
reading over the testimonies of the Lecielans."
"...Mind staying a moment while I collect my thoughts?"

"People born as Resurgent ARKS have been
carrying out research on ARKS and the DOLLS."

"From the moment they were born,
that was their only purpose in life..."

"We were all created merely as part of
this \"ARKS Development Project\" of theirs."
"The most unique of us being Meteorn, like you and I."
"And we Meteorn come from a place outside the atmosphere itself, much farther away than Leciel."
"Apparently, there's a gigantic facility up there."

"That being said, it seems not even the Lecielans know anything
about it besides the fact that it's where the Meteorn come from."

"...Even the name \"Meteorn\" itself is merely
something the people of Halpha came up with."

"The Lecielans refer to us as \"First Generation\",
\"Second Generation\", and so on."

"People like Crawford and Aina would
be descendants of the Second Generation."

"People like you and I
would be \"Third Generation\"."

"Each generation has a higher Photon
aptitude than the previous one."

"...Though I believe your abilities
are in a league of their own."

"Though I'm unclear as
to why that's the case."

"When I asked people like Manon and Faria about
your ancestry, they simply said \"I don't know\"."
"We were born to fight against the Starless."
"Whether we were born to research, or born to fight..."

"When you boil it down, we might not
be too different from the Lecielans."

"...Apologies. I've taken
up too much of your time."
"We should get back to our duties."
